alert.note: Alert for Lincoln County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 10 at 10:15AM PST until January 10 at 6:00PM PST by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM PST THIS EVENING ABOVE 5000 FEET... * WHAT...Snow expected above 5000 feet. Total snow accumulations of one to three inches. Winds gusting as high as 50 mph. * WHERE...Lincoln County. * WHEN...Until 6 PM PST this evening. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow rates of over an inch per hour are possible this afternoon and early evening. Rapidly changing conditions due to sudden moderate to heavy snowfall and reduced visibilities are possible. Travel impacts on area roadways with hazardous driving conditions are likely, including on US-93.
info.instruction: A Winter Weather Advisory for snow means periods of snow will cause primarily travel difficulties. Expect snow covered roads and limited visibilities, and use caution while driving. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
